name: Dimenser
description:
https://bitbucket.org/VytautasGruzauskas/multimedijos_projektas/src/master/

Controls: 

W - Walking forward ( context: 3D )

A - Walking to the left ( context: 3D and 2D )

S - Walking  backwards ( context: 3D and 2D )

D - Walking to the right ( context: 3D )

SPACE - Jumping ( context: 3D and 2D )

LMB - Object pick up ( context: 3D )

E - function key ( context: 3D ) 

E - protection from lightning ( context: 2D )

G - Invincibility power-up ( context: 2D )

F, LMB Attack (Primary weapon) ( context: 2D ) 

G, RMB - Liquid shooting ( context: 2D )

K - Kill player( context: 2D ) 

ALT - Drink potion ( context: 2D )
